name: Halloween at Fredbear's
description:
This is a non-profit fan game made in less than one day for Halloween By: Scott Zimmerman. Due to the success, it has gotten more updates afterwards.

Inspired & Dedicated To: Scott Cawthon

All assets and models are taken besides text, thumbnails, and blueprints. Credits to Scott Cawthon, and everyone else who has made them!

Game Features:

- 12-6 AM Night System

- Extras Menu

- Includes 2 ENDINGS

- Lore-based minigames

- Goes up to 2 stars for each ending instead of 3.

- Interesting lore that ties in with Scott Cawthon's actual FNaF series.

Welcome to Fredbear's Family Diner! Just in time for the grand reopening since 1978 and just in time for Halloween! Fredbear's Entertainment is looking for a new night guard to monitor the security cameras to make sure no individual causes a breaking and entering into into our diner since the last incident.

Fredbear's Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

This game was made using Scratch!
